## About Jonathan

I am a fourth year Finance Student at the University of Alberta. Throughout my time at the Alberta School of Business, I have gained deep experience through both co-op terms and internships, as well as through my participation in valuable courses offered in the Finance program at the University.

## Current Focus

My focus as I enter the final year of my degree is on problem decomposition and using programming toolsets for problem solving.

## Principles

When engaged in professionally related tasks, I operate on the principles of discipline, respect, punctuality, integrity, and productive collaboration.

## Professional Interests

My professional interests include trading, financial research, and data analytics/programming with respect to financial decision making and problem solving.

## Personal Interests

My personal interests include guitar with a focus on improvisation, playing hockey, board games, programming, and finance.
